title: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of VASCO Data Security International, Inc.
text: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of VASCO Data Security International, Inc. » Science & Technology Published on 2015-09-25 16:46:26 Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of VASCO Data Security International, Inc. -- NEW YORK  Harwood Feffer LLP. Harwood Feffer LLP.  ><- stripped tags -> NEW YORK   Harwood Feffer LLP ([[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2RHRnlaMlYwUFNkZllteGhibXNuSUdoeVpXWTlYQ0pvZEhSd09pOHZkM2QzTG1obVpYTnhMbU52YlZ3aUlISmxiRDFjSW01dlptOXNiRzkzWENJK2QzZDNMbWhtWlhOeExtTnZiVHd2WVQ0PXw=]]) is investigating potential claims against the board of directors of VASCO Data Security International, Inc. ("VASCO" or the "Company") (NASDAQ: [[]]), concerning whether the board has breached its fiduciary duties to shareholders. On July 21, 2015 , VASCO disclosed that certain of its products may have been illegally sold to parties in Iran subject to economic sanctions. The Company has notified the U.S. Department of the Treasury, Office of Foreign Assets Control and the U.S. Department of Commerce, Bureau of Industry and Security and will report to them the full extent of the violations once an internal review has been completed. On this news, VASCO stock nearly 33% and has not recovered. Our investigation concerns whether the Company board of directors has breached its fiduciary duties to shareholders, grossly mismanaged the Company, and/or committed abuses of control in connection with the foregoing. If you own VASCO shares and wish to discuss this matter with us, or have any questions concerning your rights and interests with regard to this matter, please contact: Robert I. Harwood, Esq.
